questionTitle: I <u><font color='red'>won't permit</font></u> <u><font color='red'>nobody</font></u> <u><font color='red'>to make</font></u> a mess <u><font color='red'>in</font></u> my house.

He was an ________ writer because he persuaded many people to see the trust of his idea .
I ________ seeing John tomorrow so I will give him your message.
The temperature yesterday was about ________ for the time of year.

The old lady was very ________ for our help.
________ it was raining heavily he went out without a raincoat.
Your progress will be ________ in six months' time.
I don't know why he complains about his low salary all the time. He doesn't earn as ________ as I do.
The company has had a bad year, and will therefore not be ________ any new workers.
He's a wonderful cook: he can make a delicious ________ out of almost anything.
From now on everything will be ________ sailing, I hope. No more problems.
